Web Scrapers

Web scraping is the act of extracting data from websites. This is a repository of scrapers Iâ€™ve built over the years for various websites. They download media files and other data. These scripts exist purely for education purposes.

The scrapers are built using Python 3 and BeautifulSoup which is a library for grabbing and navigating data from HTML and XML files.
